attributes.action: Remove all candidates that have abused the position of power
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is asking the government to remove all candidates’ of parliament that have taken advantage of their position, by taking money that was not rightly their money. And we feel that they should no only be stripped of power, but have all positions they have gained through deceit stripped away from them. 
And a full investigation by an independent company started. 
By abusing the position given to them by the public of the United Kingdom, they have broken the law, and should face the full weight of the justice system.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
